install.name: Podcast
install.author: Joseph LeBlanc and Dan Li
install.description: Provides links for users to subscribe to your podcast feeds.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: text
param.label: Text
param.description: Enter any text to be displayed along with the RSS link

param.name: urischeme
param.label: URI Scheme
param.description: Setting this option makes one-click subscriptions possible for users with iTunes

param.name: plainlink
param.label: Display Flat Link
param.description: Set this option to 'Yes' to display an additional 'Full Feed' link that uses http://. When you have a non-http link enabled above, this is useful for users who cannot do one-click subscriptions.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the Module. This allows for individual Module styling.

param.name: otherlink
param.label: Other Link
param.description: Enter custom link to use, such as one for iTunes subscriptions

param.name: otherimage
param.label: Other Image
param.description: Enter the relative or direct URL to use for the image
